name: TravelersHomeCentral
0:
”Alexa, open Home Central.”
”Alexa, ask Home Central to check for common safety issues around my home.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home central
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Is your home safety awareness as good as you think? Check your knowledge and learn some tips about how to help protect your family and your home from both household hazards and emergency situations. 

Home Central can help you check for some common safety issues around your home, give you tips about home maintenance, and share some steps to take to help you prepare for an emergency. 

If you have an Echo Show device, you’ll get a custom, video-enriched experience that provides a series of tips across various categories of home safety, and lets you track your progress via checklists. 

Ready to get started? Just ask Alexa to open Home Central and enable the skill. 

If you have an Echo device, you can say things like: 
“Home Central, how often do I need to have my septic tank cleaned?”
“Home Central, check my knowledge of emergency preparedness.”
“Home Central, help me check for some common safety issues around my home” 

If you have an Echo Show device, you can say things like:
“Home Central, tell me some fire safety tips.”
“Home Central, show me my fire safety checklist.”
“Home Central, open weather safety.”
